description.en:
Project will revolve around an algorithm trading account (provided by Ganymedetoken.com) which gains will transform into buybacks and compound interests.

Combined with this unique feature a 10% tax is applied on every sale of $BARREL, 40% go to marketing to increase visibility of the project and 60% are used to buyback $BARREL tokens.

The more weak hands sell, the more holders get rewarded with a price increase of the token.
This is what we call PumpEconomics by bernard.finance
